eu_initiatives: EOSCA is active in supporting the development and implementation of all legislation and guidance that impacts and affects the use of chemicals in oil and gas operations onshore and offshore.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit: Supporting the chemical service companies who supply and support the oil and gas exploration and production industry
